dialogue.text: Hello, what brings you to me?
dialogue.response: Joseph said you might have some work for me.
I told Henryk to come here. He wasn't eager to do so.

dialogue.text: I'm just a farmer, hard work. You probably know how it is.
I have one task, go to the tavern and tell Henry to come to me.
Thank you for wanting to do this for me.
That's Henryk all over again. You can expect that from him. You deserve something for your trouble. Go to the mayor, he said he wanted to see you.
